00118     private String SostituisciCaratteriSpeciali(String input)
00119     {
00120         for(int i=0;i<CaratteriSpeciali.length;i++)
00121             input=input.replaceAll(CaratteriSpeciali[i][1],CaratteriSpeciali[i][0]);
00122         return input;
00123     }

00133         public Yylex (java.io.Reader reader) {
00134                 this ();
00135                 if (null == reader) {
00136                         throw (new Error("Error: Bad input stream initializer."));
00137                 }
00138                 yy_reader = new java.io.BufferedReader(reader);
00139         }
00140 
00141         public Yylex (java.io.InputStream instream) {
00142                 this ();
00143                 if (null == instream) {
00144                         throw (new Error("Error: Bad input stream initializer."));
00145                 }
00146                 yy_reader = new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.InputStreamReader(instream));
00147         }

00149         private Yylex () {
00150                 yy_buffer = new char[YY_BUFFER_SIZE];
00151                 yy_buffer_read = 0;
00152                 yy_buffer_index = 0;
00153                 yy_buffer_start = 0;
00154                 yy_buffer_end = 0;
00155                 yy_at_bol = true;
00156                 yy_lexical_state = YYINITIAL;
00157         }

00169                 65,

00172         private void yybegin (int state) {
00173                 yy_lexical_state = state;
00174         }
00175         private int yy_advance ()
00176                 throws java.io.IOException {
00177                 int next_read;
00178                 int i;
00179                 int j;
00180 
00181                 if (yy_buffer_index < yy_buffer_read) {
00182                         return yy_buffer[yy_buffer_index++];
00183                 }
00184 
00185                 if (0 != yy_buffer_start) {
00186                         i = yy_buffer_start;
00187                         j = 0;
00188                         while (i < yy_buffer_read) {
00189                                 yy_buffer[j] = yy_buffer[i];
00190                                 ++i;
00191                                 ++j;
00192                         }
00193                         yy_buffer_end = yy_buffer_end - yy_buffer_start;
00194                         yy_buffer_start = 0;
00195                         yy_buffer_read = j;
00196                         yy_buffer_index = j;
00197                         next_read = yy_reader.read(yy_buffer,
00198                                         yy_buffer_read,
00199                                         yy_buffer.length - yy_buffer_read);
00200                         if (-1 == next_read) {
00201                                 return YY_EOF;
00202                         }
00203                         yy_buffer_read = yy_buffer_read + next_read;
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 while (yy_buffer_index >= yy_buffer_read) {
00207                         if (yy_buffer_index >= yy_buffer.length) {
00208                                 yy_buffer = yy_double(yy_buffer);
00209                         }
00210                         next_read = yy_reader.read(yy_buffer,
00211                                         yy_buffer_read,
00212                                         yy_buffer.length - yy_buffer_read);
00213                         if (-1 == next_read) {
00214                                 return YY_EOF;
00215                         }
00216                         yy_buffer_read = yy_buffer_read + next_read;
00217                 }
00218                 return yy_buffer[yy_buffer_index++];
00219         }
00220         private void yy_move_end () {
00221                 if (yy_buffer_end > yy_buffer_start &&
00222                     '\n' == yy_buffer[yy_buffer_end-1])
00223                         yy_buffer_end--;
00224                 if (yy_buffer_end > yy_buffer_start &&
00225                     '\r' == yy_buffer[yy_buffer_end-1])
00226                         yy_buffer_end--;
00227         }
00228         private boolean yy_last_was_cr=false;
00229         private void yy_mark_start () {
00230                 yy_buffer_start = yy_buffer_index;
00231         }
00232         private void yy_mark_end () {
00233                 yy_buffer_end = yy_buffer_index;
00234         }
00235         private void yy_to_mark () {
00236                 yy_buffer_index = yy_buffer_end;
00237                 yy_at_bol = (yy_buffer_end > yy_buffer_start) &&
00238                             ('\r' == yy_buffer[yy_buffer_end-1] ||
00239                              '\n' == yy_buffer[yy_buffer_end-1] ||
00240                              2028/*LS*/ == yy_buffer[yy_buffer_end-1] ||
00241                              2029/*PS*/ == yy_buffer[yy_buffer_end-1]);
00242         }
00243         private java.lang.String yytext () {
00244                 return (new java.lang.String(yy_buffer,
00245                         yy_buffer_start,
00246                         yy_buffer_end - yy_buffer_start));
00247         }
00248         private int yylength () {
00249                 return yy_buffer_end - yy_buffer_start;
00250         }
00251         private char[] yy_double (char buf[]) {
00252                 int i;
00253                 char newbuf[];
00254                 newbuf = new char[2*buf.length];
00255                 for (i = 0; i < buf.length; ++i) {
00256                         newbuf[i] = buf[i];
00257                 }
00258                 return newbuf;
00259         }
00260         private final int YY_E_INTERNAL = 0;
00261         private final int YY_E_MATCH = 1;
00262         private java.lang.String yy_error_string[] = {
00263                 "Error: Internal error.\n",
00264                 "Error: Unmatched input.\n"
00265         };
00266         private void yy_error (int code,boolean fatal) {
00267                 java.lang.System.out.print(yy_error_string[code]);
00268                 java.lang.System.out.flush();
00269                 if (fatal) {
00270                         throw new Error("Fatal Error.\n");
00271                 }
00272         }
00273         private int[][] unpackFromString(int size1, int size2, String st) {
00274                 int colonIndex = -1;
00275                 String lengthString;
00276                 int sequenceLength = 0;
00277                 int sequenceInteger = 0;
00278 
00279                 int commaIndex;
00280                 String workString;
00281 
00282                 int res[][] = new int[size1][size2];
00283                 for (int i= 0; i < size1; i++) {
00284                         for (int j= 0; j < size2; j++) {
00285                                 if (sequenceLength != 0) {
00286                                         res[i][j] = sequenceInteger;
00287                                         sequenceLength--;
00288                                         continue;
00289                                 }
00290                                 commaIndex = st.indexOf(',');
00291                                 workString = (commaIndex==-1) ? st :
00292                                         st.substring(0, commaIndex);
00293                                 st = st.substring(commaIndex+1);
00294                                 colonIndex = workString.indexOf(':');
00295                                 if (colonIndex == -1) {
00296                                         res[i][j]=Integer.parseInt(workString);
00297                                         continue;
00298                                 }
00299                                 lengthString =
00300                                         workString.substring(colonIndex+1);
00301                                 sequenceLength=Integer.parseInt(lengthString);
00302                                 workString=workString.substring(0,colonIndex);
00303                                 sequenceInteger=Integer.parseInt(workString);
00304                                 res[i][j] = sequenceInteger;
00305                                 sequenceLength--;
00306                         }
00307                 }
00308                 return res;
00309         }
